I thought I would start with a very
brief history of cities settlements
typically began with people clustered

Villages they're all about a mile apart

for hundreds even thousands of years the

production of work a center of health
care that's where babies were born and
people
died then with

had centralized energy production
learning took place in schools healthc
care took place in

industrial commercial areas you had Auto

really uh give everybody a car build
roads to everything and give people a

we still live in that world and this is

you have these unbelievable new cities

alone 300 million people some say 400

there's some trends that will impact

is becoming a center of life so it's a

most of what people need in life can be
